techmeme.title: Ring announces a new partnership with fire safety brand Kidde to launch smart smoke and carbon monoxide alarms, starting at $54.97 and launching in April 2025 (Jennifer Pattison Tuohy/The Verge)
Disney and Fubo announce a deal as part of which Disney will combine Hulu + Live TV with Fubo in a joint venture and Fubo will drop Venu Sports lawsuit (Todd Spangler/Variety)
TiVo plans to launch TiVo OS in the US with a new Sharp TV, arriving as soon as February 2025, rivaling the likes of Roku, Google TV, and Amazon's Fire TV (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Comcast plans to launch Universal Ads in Q1 2025 to simplify ad buying and win over SMB advertisers from Big Tech, and signs deals with NBCUniversal and others (Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
Avataar debuts Velocity, an AI tool that generates product videos based on a product link, and says HP, Victoria's Secret, Lowe's, and others are using the tool (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
